name: The Beach has Crabs
description:
This entry has been in development for approximately 19 days, for buddy jam. KitKatarine and Pihro have created this in their spare time despite their busy lives acting as the stunt crew for popular action movies, as well as running a full time venomous snake rescue effort. 

This is a game about a crab. A crab that has to clean up a beach after the humans made a mess. It shouldn't be the crabs responsibility, but someone has to do it. That someone is a crab.

Feel free to check things out and give us feedback. Thank you.
